meanings.definition: friges (verb): third person singular present of 'fridge'
meanings.sent1: She friges the leftovers in the fridge every night.
meanings.sent2: He always friges the milk after opening it.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to friges the fish but couldn't open the fridge.
meanings.sent4: His love for cooking friges his passion for trying new recipes.
meanings.sent5: Remember to friges the vegetables to keep them fresh.

meanings.sent1: The store had many different friges on sale.
meanings.sent2: We bought two new friges for the kitchen renovation.
